Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Capital
Description: A quadrangular capital. Each upper corner has a volute of about 12-13 cm in size. In the middle of each of the four side panels framed by these corner volutes, there is a geometric relief decoration in the shape of three half-cubes stacked vertically on top of one another (geometric representation of a floral pattern ?).
